plot: This the last part of Depardon's triptych &"Profils paysans&" about what it is like to be a farmer today in an isolated highland area. &"La vie moderne&" examines what has become of the persons he has followed for ten years while featuring younger people who try to farm or raise cattle or poultry, come hell or high water.   Written by  Guy Bellinger
title: La vie moderne
plot_es: This the last part of Depardon's triptych &"Profils paysans&" about what it is like to be a farmer today in an isolated highland area. &"La vie moderne&" examines what has become of the persons he has followed for ten years while featuring younger people who try to farm or raise cattle or poultry, come hell or high water. cast.role: Lui-même - 63 ans, un fermier à la retraite
cast.name: Abel Jeanroy

cast.role: Lui-même - qui a repris la ferme sans enthousiasme
